title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the context menu does not display the Team entry.
OB: The Team entry is not displayed in the context menu.
EB: The Team entry should be displayed in the context menu.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the project that contains a .java file and another resource.
2. Right-click on the .java file or the other resource to open the context menu.
3. Verify if the Team entry is displayed in the context menu.
4. If the Team entry is not present, this bug is reproduced.
